title: Dear Rito.... Why?
body: Why doesn't academy Ecko have a fancy cricket bat? Like you could make him the star cricket play of the academy, and were these skins just an excuse for school girl ahri?

replies.body:
Hey Dreadabelle,

Academy Ekko does have a cricket bat for this skin!
so he does... but what of the other point i brought up?
No, it wasn't an excuse to make a school girl Ahri.
ok then... sometimes it just seems like rito has no shame
and a question, does rito look in the community creations for champion ideas?
